description: Adobe Audition CC is part of the new Creative Cloud release and this QuickStart! will get you up and running with the new features. Author Sam McGuire demonstrates the basics of how Audition integrates into the cloud, the new features in CC, and some of the features which are returning to Audition from earlier versions. From sound remover to burning CDs, this QuickStart! is an excellent resource for anyone who wants to get up to speed with this update. This title is a self-paced software training course delivered via pre-recorded video. We do not provide additional information outside of the posted content.
title: QuickStart! - Adobe Audition CC
